name: Tower of Nod
summary:
Tower of Nod is an action-roguelike deckbuilding platformer with unique sleep-based controls. You are a Hero that can masterfully manipulate the falling Blocks and build a path upwards... but only while you're asleep! Move quickly and confidently to avoid the blocks above and lava below.

Build a deck of pieces at your disposal to aid your journey upwards and grant you temporary boosts. Pair them with powerful relics to create unique synergies. Climb higher and higher while managing your sleeping state to stay out of danger!
